hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select eo.EORI_ID, eo.CREATOR, eo.CREATE_TIME, eo.MODIFIER, eo.MODIFY_TIME, eo.REC_VER, eo.REC_STATUS, eo.COMPANY_CODE, eo.SITE_CODE, eo.EORI_REJECTED_NO, eo.EORI_ORDER_NO, eo.EORI_TRUST_NO, eo.EORI_CUSTOMER_CODE, eo.EORI_CUSTOMER_NAME, eo.EORI_CARRIER_NAME, eo.EORI_CARRIER_CODE, eo.EORI_REJECTED_DATE, eo.EORI_REJECTED_STATUS, eo.EORI_GROSS_PACKAGES, eo.EORI_GROSS_VOLUME, eo.EORI_RETURN_NO, eo.EORI_RETURN_RECEIVE_TIME, eo.EORI_RETURN_IN_WH_TIME, eo.EORI_GOOD_PACKAGES, eo.EORI_BAD_PACKAGES, eo.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_NO, eo.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_QTY, eo.EORI_CLOSE_TRANSIT_TIME, eo.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_NO, eo.EORI_RETURN_DAMAGE_QTY, eo.EORI_DAMAGE_STATE, eo.EORI_SOURCES, eo.EORI_OPEN_PLACE, eo.EORI_EOSM_NAME, eo.EORI_EOSM_CODE, eo.EORI_POL_NAME, eo.EORI_POL_CODE, eo.EORI_POD_NAME, eo.EORI_POD_CODE, eo.EORI_REJECTED_USER, eo.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_NAME, eo.EORI_REJECTED_ADDRESS_CODE, eo.EORI_REJECTED_REMARK, eo.EORI_BACK_REASON, eo.EORI_THREE_PARTY_NO, eo.OPERATE_CODE, eo.OPERATE_NAME, eo.EORI_IS_C_ORDER, eo.EORI_TRANSPORT_MODE, eo.EORI_TASK_BIG_TYPE, eo.EORI_RETURN_TYPE, eo.EORI_QUIT_REMARK, eo.EORI_DOWNSTREAM_NO, eo.EORI_RETURN_CUSTOMER_NO,
ei.EORI_CODE, ei.EORI_NAME, ei.EORI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, ei.EORI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, ei.EORI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, ei.EORI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, ei.EORI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, ei.EORI_QUANTITY, ei.EORI_GROSS_WEIGHT, ei.EORI_NET_WEIGHT, ei.EORI_VOLUME, ei.EORI_PRICE, ei.EORI_AMOUNT, ei.EORI_REMARK, ei.EORI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, ei.EORI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, ei.EORI_LINK_PM_CODE, ei.EORI_LINE_NO, ei.EORI_LOTATT02, ei.EORI_LOTATT03, ei.EORI_LOTATT04, ei.EORI_LOTATT05, ei.EORI_LOTATT06, ei.EORI_LOTATT07, ei.EORI_LOTATT08, ei.EORI_LOTATT09, ei.EORI_LOTATT10, ei.EORI_LOTATT11, ei.EORI_LOTATT12, ei.EORI_IS_COMBINATION, ei.EORI_UNIT_QUANTITY, ei.EORI_UNIT_GROSS_WEIGHT, ei.EORI_UNIT_VOLUME, ei.EORI_MAIN_GOODS_CODE, ei.EORI_EXPRESS_NO, ei.EORI_SUBSTR1, ei.EORI_SUBSTR2, ei.EORI_SUBSTR3, ei.EORI_SUBSTR4, ei.EORI_SUBDATE1, ei.EORI_SUBDATE2, ei.EORI_SUBNUM1, ei.EORI_SUBNUM2 from eo_rejection_info eo left join eo_rejection_item ei on eo.eori_rejected_no = ei.eori_rejected_no where 1=1 <<AND eo.eori_rejected_no LIKE :eoriRejectedNo>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
